item.title: A Step Towards Teleportation
item.description:
Let’s travel and yet not let time to travel.

It ain’t the platform 9Â¾ nor the transporter from the Star Trek Universe. The Eye of Agamotto was a feast to our eyes, sadly, Dr. Strange didn’t share the science. But now is the time for fiction to transition into reality.
